titleNullable: Amazon Top cell Phones and Accessories QA
subtitleNullable: Answers for Amazon Customer Queries , followed with Yes or No.
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains question and answers for Amazon cell phones and Accessories .
Citation :- Addressing complex and subjective product-related queries with customer reviews .

This dataset can be used to build the chatbot or recommendation of answers for questions based on similarity score.
